roleset.name: enclose
roleset.note: WRAP-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls spray-9.7-1. (from wrap.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: They could take the kneaded clay , wrap it on the outside of the shards , and tap it down lightly with a wooden stick to make the clay more compact and solid .
example.arg: on the outside of the shards

roleset.name: finish, non-phrasal, conclude or recap
roleset.note: WRAP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from wrap.04-v)
WRAP-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of nombank. No VN or FN class. Framed by Katie. (from wrap.01-n)

example.text: I just heard ! Awesome dude ! It 's funny they would n't let us hire anyone and now they 're trying to find dayplayers to wrap a location because we 're swamped haha . See you soon buddy !

example.name: arg0
example.text: A wrap from CentCom and here is Fredricka Whitfield at the CNN Center.

example.name: both args
example.text: In our early wrap of the week that was, Time magazine editor-at-large Belinda Luscom...

roleset.name: finish
roleset.note: WRAP_UP-V NOTES: Maybe won't take instrument? (from wrap.02-v)

example.name: agentive, transitive
example.text: And [the lawyers]-1 were just as eager as the judge *trace*-1 to wrap it up.

example.name: ergative
example.text: Jaguar executives said last week they expect to have a friendly alliance with GM wrapped up by the end of the month.

roleset.name: wrap_up: wrap completely
roleset.note: WRAP_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on NewTestament-3. No VNcls. (from wrap.03-v)
